Definition.Name: Sentinel One Containment
Definition.Description: An embedded workflow that can receive inputs and return an output.
Definition.Creator: e22b1df1-d620-4af5-ba42-d29e1b73bfe9

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: SentinelOneV2_Disconnect Agent From Network
Steps.Description: Disconnect agent from network by it's host name or IP address.

Steps.Name: Condition
Steps.Description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Context Scope":"Alert","Key Name":"REMEDIATION","Key Value":"[Alert.REMEDIATION]<sep> Containment not executed: No target resources identified."}

Steps.InstanceName: Proceed to Remediation : Isolate Host and/or Reset User Credentials
Steps.Name: MultiChoiceQuestion
Steps.Description: This step conditions the progress of the playbook according to a question the analyst has to answer manually, would be used most for questions which can't be answered automatically

Parameters.Name: Question
Parameters.Value: Would you like to proceed to remediation steps?

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Context Scope":"Alert","Key Name":"REMEDIATION","Key Value":"[Alert.REMEDIATION]<sep>During the investigation of the alert it  was decided to blacklist the hash(es)."}

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Context Scope":"Alert","Key Name":"REMEDIATION","Key Value":"[Alert.REMEDIATION]<sep>During the investigation of the alert it  was decided to isolate the endpoint."}

Steps.Name: SiemplifyUtilities_Count Entities In Scope
Steps.Description: Count the number of entities from a specific scope.

Steps.Name: Siemplify_Set Scope Context Value
Steps.Description: Action sets a value for a key specified that is stored in the Siemplify database. Available scopes to get context values for: Alert, Case, Global. Action is not working on Siemplify entities. Note: Key Name parameter is case insensitive.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Context Scope":"Alert","Key Name":"REMEDIATION","Key Value":"[Alert.REMEDIATION]<sep>Failed to isolate the endpoint: An error occurred during the containment process."}

Steps.Name: Entity Selection
Steps.Description: Creates a group of entities that can be used in other actions. Use conditions to fine tune the group.

Steps.Name: SentinelOneV2_Create Hash Blacklist Record
Steps.Description: Add hashes to a blacklist in SentinelOne. Note: Only SHA1 hashes are supported.

Parameters.Name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
Parameters.Value: {"Operating System":"windows","Site IDs":"","Group IDs":"","Account IDs":"","Description":"","Add to global black list":false}
